title: L'Ame Immortelle - Discography and Extras (1997-2008) [mp3@VB
description:
L&#039; Ame Immortelle (French: the immortal soul) is an Austrian band that produces Neue Deutsche HÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤rte. Many of L&#039;ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡me Immortelle&#039;s songs feature melancholy or lovelorn lyrics in German or English, and juxtaposed harsh male and emotional female vocals.
Current work has moved away from the band&#039;s electronic, club-friendly danceable beat roots into the Neue Deutsche HÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¤rte (New German hardness) genre with industrial and darkwave influence.
